title: Would like my boards level to be updated please <3
body: So made this account due to the rules of the Roleplay boards, and apparently after I got this account to level 6, the boards portion of it wouldn't really update. I was told to just post on here and see if someone can take the time to do it?

replies.body: By posting here it would have pushed an update to sync your boards level and summoner level. I double checked, since your boards level is still showing level 5, and it looks like your summoner level is still level 5 as well.
Yup it updated a while after posting! Thank you for responding, don't quite know how the boards tech works still .
